title: The Complete Sherlock Holmes Canon - Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
description:
The Complete Sherlock Holmes Canon by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

The unabridged audiobooks are performed by Sir Derek Jacobi.

Also included is 'The House of Silk', the official new Sherlock Holmes novel by Anthony Horowitz.

All the audiobooks are ripped by me from CDs using Exact Audio Copy and are in the m4b audiobook format with iTunes compatible chapters.

The BBC Radio dramas star Clive Merrison as Holmes & Michael Williams as Watson. They are also ripped by me from CDs using Exact Audio Copy and are variable bitrate mp3s. The only exception being the 'Hound of the Baskervilles'.

The BBC reversioned the CDs of Baskervilles into a movie length drama, rather than its original two episodes. This annoyed me so much that I reconstructed the two part format by combining my CD rip with an off-air recording of the episodes from digital radio. The digital radio portions are the first and last three minutes of episode one and the first four minutes of episode two. In my opinion the difference in sound quality for those portions is negligible.

Also included is 'The Further Adventures of Sherlock Holmes' by Bert Coules starring Clive Merrison as Holmes & Andrew Sachs as Watson, also ripped from CDs with EAC.

Here is the complete list:

Unabridged Audiobooks read by Sir Derek Jacobi,

1887 A Study in Scarlet by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1890 The Sign of the Four by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1892 The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1893 The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1902 The Hound of the Baskervilles by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1904 The Return of Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1915 The Valley of Fear by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1917 Sherlock Holmes His Last Bow by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

1927 The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Canon Doyle

2011 The House of Silk by Anthony Horowitz

BBC Radio Dramas,

1887 A Study in Scarlet - Two Episodes

1890 The Sign of the Four - Two Episodes

1892 The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes - Twelve Episodes

1893 The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes - Eleven Episodes

1902 The Hound of the Baskervilles - Two Episodes

1904 The Return of Sherlock Holmes - Thirteen Episodes

1915 The Valley of Fear - Two Episodes

1917 Sherlock Holmes His Last Bow - Eight Episodes

1927 The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes - Twelve Episodes

2002 - 2010 The Further Adventures of Sherlock Holmes - Sixteen Episodes
